5a4ac29008850","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrhfPgVNf5mkdhQvy1pMv51TFokD3Y4Wa5WZhFqVh8UV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"src/Crowdfunding.sol":{"keccak256":"0x84e093546e1cd3c728218ceefff201dc0a1b73bf633a5017350116447f8ca6b7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9e8cb245696ead54454f3d64357d94a48f8ca8f0aad96c5f88ada197fd895ec8","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ1x4FYwAaSVGrLszoTTsv5bovxzERgYgGxjcJcFkYEMN"]}},"version":1}

cancelContribution(uint256).details: cancelContribution allows anyone to cancel their contribution

contribute(uint256,uint256).details: contribute allows anyone to contribute to a campaign

params._amount: the amount of tokens to contribute

params._duration: the duration of the campaign in seconds
params._goal: amount of funds to be raised in USD

params._id: The ID of the campaign to fetch details for.

returns.creator: The address of the campaign creator.
returns.endTime: The end time of the campaign as a Unix timestamp.
returns.goal: The fundraising goal of the campaign (in USD).
returns.isActive: A boolean indicating whether the campaign is active.
returns.totalFunds: The total funds raised by the campaign (in USD).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createCampaign(uint256,uint256).notice: createCampaign allows anyone to create a campaign

getCampaign(uint256).notice: getCampaign returns details about a specific campaign.

getContribution(uint256,address).notice: getContribution returns the contribution of a contributor in USD

refund(uint256).notice: refund allows the contributors to get a refund if the campaign failed

withdrawFunds(uint256).notice: withdrawFunds allows the creator of the campaign to withdraw the funds
